sentence: The war cry for justice was all over - Much to the chagrin of the authorities.
Basque: Gerra Justiziarentzako oihu egin zen, agintarien katagrinarekiko askoz ere.
backtrans: The war shouted for justice, much to the catagrin of the authorities.

sentence: The regime's decision adumbrates the underlying agenda.
Basque: Erregimenaren erabakiak azpiko agenda adumbratzen du.
backtrans: The decision of the regime adumbends the underlying agenda.

sentence: The community was anxious over the passing of the much needed reforms.
Basque: Erkidegoa aski behar den erreformak igarotzen zen.
backtrans: The Community passed the necessary reforms.

sentence: The think tank  published a paper outlining their apology of capital punishment.
Basque: Think Tank-ek paperezko zigorraren barkamena erakusten duen papera argitaratu zuen.
backtrans: Think Tank published a paper that shows the pardon of paper penalty.

sentence: Aught was left of the petition's validity
backtrans: The validity of the AUGHT request was left

sentence: The President exhorted his ministers to buckle up as key opposition support for his economic plan was about to buckle.
Basque: Presidenteak bere ministroak erori zituen bere plan ekonomikoaren aurkako funtsezko laguntza izan zen bezala.
backtrans: The president fell as a key support against his economic plan.

sentence: The voters were chuffed to see the bill passed.
backtrans: The voter passed the bill to see.

sentence: The lawyer's discursive narration swayed the jury.
Basque: Abokatuaren narrazio diskurtsiboak epaimahaiak eragin zuen.
backtrans: The lawyer's discursive narrative affected the jury.

sentence: The EU block opposed an eventual imposition of anti-dumping measures.
Basque: EBko blokeak isurketen aurkako neurrien inposaketaren aurka egin zuen.
backtrans: The EU block made against imposition of anti-discharge measures.

sentence: A fulsome eulogy was delivered by the sly counsel.
Basque: Eulogia fulsome bat inkestak eman zuen.
backtrans: He gave an eulogy Fulsome survey.

sentence: The gig-economy agency decided to garnish the refunds!
Basque: GIG-Ekonomia Agentziak itzulketak garatatzea erabaki zuen!
backtrans: GIG-Economic Agency decided to develop refunds!

sentence: Members of the anti-theocratic revolutionary movement overthrew the peers in power!
Basque: Mugimendu iraultzailearen aurkako herrietako kideek beren kideak boterean bota zituzten!
backtrans: Members of the villagers against the revolutionary movement were thrown in power by their members!

sentence: The traitors disappointingly decided to fight with the colonialists.
backtrans: The traitor decided to fight with colonialists.
